name: Jerimber: Champion of men
lore: Once a noble knight defiled by the abyss, he now wanders the dark paths seeking redemption in blood and silence. His armor is fused to his flesh.

name: Rubenski: Goblin assassin
lore: A creature of shadow and venom, outcast by his own kind. He sold his soul to a lower demon for the ability to walk utterly unheard.

name: Alynn: Princess of The forgotten land
lore: The last survivor of a kingdom swallowed by the mist. She carries the cursed crown of her father, looking for a way to undo the ancient spell.

name: Mattius: Frog Wizard from the swamp
lore: An ancient druid cursed into a monstrous form. He wields chaotic swamp magic, his mind slowly slipping into amphibian madness.

name: Kiara: Legendary thief
lore: She stole from the crypt of a Lich Lord and lived to tell the tale. Now she is hunted by things that do not sleep, forever on the run.

name: Ri'kardish: Spirit of a dark lord
lore: A spectral remnant of ultimate evil, bound to this realm by hatred alone. It seeks a vessel strong enough to contain its terrible power.
